recommendations: MarineTraffic tile service is not accessible. This was the primary AIS data source. MarineTraffic has commercialized their API (requires paid subscription).
AISstream.io is accessible. This is a modern WebSocket-based AIS provider. Consider this as a potential alternative data source.
